profileAlternative.name: Prathamesh Karve
profileAlternative.headline: Seeking Internship for Spring/Summer 2020 | Ex Software Engineer-II at Cisco (4+ YOE) | TA at SJSU | MS in Software Engg
profileAlternative.summary:
"It's easier to be committed, when you're passionate."
Heard these words for the first time on SportsCenter, and have always believed in them.

I'm a Software Engineer, always working on innovative ideas that fuel my passion for problem-solving using technology. I worked for 4+ years at leading networking software provider Cisco Systems.

I have worked on a bunch of different technologies - neural networks, mobile apps, Linux device drivers, L2/L3 networking, web frameworks (full-stack - MEAN, PHP/MySQL), IoT platforms/fog computing and analytics.

Have a keen interest in learning new technologies and implementing them to develop amazing solutions.
